resources.string: Choose the larger of the two numbers.\nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points
Choose the larger of the two Roman numerals.\nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points

"Congratulations, you've completed the level.\n Did you know that the number 7 is considered the luckiest. There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes, 7 days of the universe and other interesting facts. Also, the number 7 is one of the most beloved numbers in the whole world!"
"Congratulations, you've completed the level.\n Did you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals!"
Choose a photo where the tongue is more visible. \n Questions can be repeated until you score 20 points
"Congratulations, you've completed the level. \n Did you know that before hitting a tree with its beak, a woodpecker retracts its tongue and wraps it around its brain to prevent injury."
Select an edible photo. \n Questions can be repeated until you score 20 points"
"Congratulations, you've completed the level. \n Did you know that the crocodile swallows stones, not because they are edible for him, but because they help him sink to the bottom!"
